Articles.Content:
Ok, so I have an undocking bug. I can't say which mod is causing the problems. I can say Mechjeb fails to work after the undocking bug occurs. It makes the node for movement, but never engages the engines.

Now I have 4 Kerbals to rescue.

 

J.

I got it. Downloaded the fix. Hate that I posted when there was a fix. Didn't see it the first time I searched.

 

J
